name: Squarcat
description:
High in the sky, mysterious lands hover. There lives a Squarecat and adventure begin here!
Your task is to reach the finish line by solving different puzzles.

-The game is expanded on two screens.
-Cute, simple graphics.
-The game has a soothing atmosphere.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
